statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_reports;
SELECT report_id, farm_id, report_date FROM environmental_impact_reports WHERE impact_type = 'Water';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports, impact_type FROM environmental_impact_reports GROUP BY impact_type;
SELECT farm_id, report_date FROM environmental_impact_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_reports WHERE farm_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM environmental_impact_reports WHERE impact_type = 'Water Pollution' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_id, farm_id, report_date, impact_type FROM environmental_impact_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT farm_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM environmental_impact_reports GROUP BY farm_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT report_id, impact_description FROM environmental_impact_reports WHERE impact_description LIKE '%deforestation%'
SELECT * FROM farm_reports WHERE crop_type = 'Corn';
SELECT farm_name, pesticide_usage FROM farm_reports WHERE soil_quality = 'Good';
SELECT report_date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_reports WHERE rainfall > 0.5;
SELECT farm_name, crop_type FROM farm_reports ORDER BY farm_name ASC;
SELECT report_date, temperature, humidity, rainfall FROM weather_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm_reports WHERE farm_name = 'Farm A' AND soil_quality = 'Good';
SELECT farm_name, crop_type FROM farm_reports WHERE pesticide_usage = TRUE AND soil_quality != 'Poor' ORDER BY farm_name DESC;
SELECT farm_name, COUNT(report_id) AS report_count FROM farm_reports GROUP BY farm_name HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 2 ORDER BY report_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm_reports WHERE crop_type IN ('Corn', 'Tomato') AND pesticide_usage = FALSE LIMIT 5;
SELECT farm_name, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM weather_reports GROUP BY farm_name ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm_data;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, location FROM farm_data WHERE acreage > 100;
SELECT farm_name, crop_type FROM farm_data ORDER BY crop_type DESC;
SELECT usage_id, pesticide_name, quantity_used, application_date FROM pesticide_usage WHERE usage_id <= 5;
SELECT report_id, farm_id, report_date FROM report_data WHERE overall_impact = 'High';
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, location, crop_type, acreage FROM farm_data;
SELECT * FROM farm_data WHERE acreage > 1000 ORDER BY farm_id DESC;
SELECT farm_id, crop_type, acreage, farm_name FROM farm_data WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY acreage DESC;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, location, crop_type, acreage FROM farm_data WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY location ASC, farm_id DESC;
SELECT report_id, farm_id, report_date, overall_impact FROM report_data INNER JOIN farm_data ON report_data.farm_id = farm_data.farm_id WHERE overall_impact = 'Positive' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm_reports;
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM farm_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_date, farm_location, report_description FROM farm_reports WHERE farm_name = 'ABC Farm';
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, crop_yield FROM crop_data WHERE crop_yield > 1000 ORDER BY crop_yield DESC;
SELECT temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE weather_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM farm_reports;
SELECT farm_name, farm_location, report_date FROM farm_reports WHERE farm_location='California';
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, crop_yield FROM crop_data WHERE crop_yield>10000;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature>30 AND humidity<50;
SELECT farm_name, report_date, report_description FROM farm_reports WHERE farm_name='Farm X';
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM Farmers WHERE farmer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, planting_date FROM Crops ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Pesticides WHERE usage_quantity > 100;
SELECT report_date, report_type FROM Reports WHERE farmer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_id, farmer_name FROM Farmers WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM Crops WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY planting_date DESC;

SELECT report_date, farmer_name, crop_name, usage_quantity FROM Reports INNER JOIN Farmers ON Reports.farmer_id = Farmers.farmer_id INNER JOIN Pesticides ON Reports.pesticide_id = Pesticides.pesticide_id;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM ImpactMetrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 5;
